بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
أقر عبد اللّه بن محمّد ان العشرين
دينارا الّتي ضمنها يحيى بن إسحق عن
شبيب بن ثيدر فلاوه قد قبض
منها ستّة عشر دينارا ولم
يبق له من ذلك إلّا أربعة الدّنانير
على يحيى بن إسحق شهد حفص بن محمّد
على عبد اللّه بن محمّد
بكلّما في هذا الكتاب
شهد تتوس تتوس بن يحنّس بما في هذا الكتاب
‮وكتب في شعبان سنة ‪σμα‬
شهد رجا بن عطا على إقرار عبد اللّه بن محمّد
ويحيى بن إسحق بما في هذا الكتاب
شهد أحمد بن محمّد بن أبي الفرج الإصبهاني الّبزّاز على إقرار عبد اللّه بن محمّد
أقر أنّه لم يبق له على يحيى بن إسحق من الخط الّذي له عنده إلّا أربعة
الدّنانير وذلك في شعبان سنة إحدى وأربعين وماتين وأقر عبد اللّه بن محمّد أن الخط
الّذي عنده ليحيى بن إسحق لم يبق على يحيى إلّا أربعة الدّنانير
وأحمد بن عيسى وكتب شهادته بخطّه

Au nom de Dieu clément et miséricordieux! In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
ʿAbdallâh b. Muḥammad has acknowledged that (4/5) he has received sixteen dînârs of the twenty ʿAbd Allāh Ibn Muḥammad a reconnu que vingt
dînârs in respect to which Yaḥyâ b. Isḥâq had stood surety for dīnārs, pour lesquels Yaḥyā Ibn Isḥaq s’est porté garant à la place de
Šabîb b. Theodor Flâwe; Šabīb Ibn Théodore Flāwe, il en a déjà reçu
and there does not seize dīnārs et qu’il ne
lui en reste que quatre dīnārs remain thereof to the debit of Yaḥyâ b. Isḥâq
auprès de Yaḥyā Ibn Isḥaq. Ḥafṣ Ibn Muḥammad a témoigné, but four dînârs. Witness is Ḥafṣ b. Muḥammad
à la charge de ʿAbd Allāh Ibn Muḥammad, as to the responsibility of ʿAbdallâh b. Muḥammad
de tout le contenu de ce document. respecting all that (is contained) in this document.
A témoigné Tanūs Ibn Yoḥannes du contenu de ce document Tanûs b. Yoḥannes is witness respecting that which (is contained) in this document
and he has written (it) in Šaʿbân of the year 241. et il (l’)écrivit en šaʿbān de l’année 241.
A témoigné Raǧā Ibn ʿAṭā de la reconnaissance de ʿAbd Allāh Ibn Muḥammad Riǧâ b. ʿAṭâ is witness too the acknowledgment by ʿAbdallâh b. Muḥammad
and (by) Yaḥyâ b. Isḥâq respecting the tenor of this document. et de Yaḥyā Ibn Isḥāq du contenu de ce document.
A témoigné Aḥmad Ibn Muḥammad Ibn Abī l-Faraǧ al Isbahānī, le marchand d’étoffes, de la reconnaissance de ʿAbd Allāh Ibn Muḥammad Witness is Aḥmad b. Muḥammad b. Abiʾl-Faraǧ, originating from Iṣbahân, the linen merchant, to the acknowledgment by ʿAbdallâh b. Muḥammad;
he has acknowledged that there does not remain to his credit (and) to the debit of Yaḥyâ b. Isḥâq according to the obligation in writing which is in his favour and (held) by him, but four qu’il ne lui reste comme dette sur le compte de Yaḥyā Ibn Isḥāq de l’obligation en sa faveur et au débit de celui-ci, que les quatre
dînârs, and this in Šaʿbân of the year two hundred and forty one; and ʿAbdallâh b. Muḥammad has acknowledged that the obligation in writing dīnārs, et ceci en šaʿbān de l’année deux cent quarante et une; (et il a témoigné) que ʿAbd Allāh Ibn Muḥammad a reconnu que de l’obligation
qu’il a et qui charge Yaḥyā Ibn Isḥāq il ne reste [...] sur le compte de Yaḥyā que les quatre dīnārs [....] which is (held) by him, is to the favour of Yaḥyâ b. Isḥâq; there does not remain .......... to the debit of Yaḥyâ b. Isḥâq but four dînârs ........
And (by) Aḥmad b. ʿÎsâ who has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting. Et (a témoigné) aussi Aḥmad Ibn ʿĪsā, et il écrivit son témoignage de sa main.
